== Main Inclusion Report for espeak ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in Ubuntu universe http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/e/espeak, built on all platforms.
 0. ''Rationale:''  
** We want to build `gnome-speech` with it to add a eSpeak synthesizer.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** 3 open bugs in "<nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:espeak|Debbugs]]</nowiki>", one fixed with Ubuntu already (new version.
** 1 open <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/espeak/+bugs|Ubuntu bug]]</nowiki>.
** No bugs in the <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=159649&atid=812675|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard debhelper packaging
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** all already in main
